markdown.name: markdown-1p-mid
markdown.p: We’ve always been a fan of owning less. The idea of buying one good kitchen knife as opposed to five ehh ones. I think our time on the sailboat inspired that. Having less stuff means be able to up andhat. Having less stuff means be able to up and go when the opportunity arises.

markdown.name: markdown-2p-mid
markdown.p: We’ve always been a fan of owning less. The idea of buying one good kitchen knife as opposed to five ehh ones. I think our time on the sailboat inspired that. Having less stuff means be able to up and go when the opportunity arises.

Nico and I thought for a while about what kind of products we wanted to carry, ultimately landing on selling things we would want in our home.
